ygData.subject: Re: Alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: I still havent bought it but from what I ve read, it just improves your faction a bit. So a dark elf guard would still attack you, but some dwarf merchant that
ygData.messageBody:
I still havent bought it but from what I've read, it just improves your
faction a bit. So a dark elf guard would still attack you, but some dwarf
merchant that does not like elves might sell to you for a bad price instead
of not selling and another merchant that was selling to you for a bad price
might give you a better price.
Skara.

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Devorkin [mailto:devo@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 2:55 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Alliance


From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>

I am from Flewithe, and still in that general area doing all my exploring
there, I am half way to level 11, and i want to get the spell Alliance to
have for when i travel to new areas. i can not seem to find in in Felwithe,
i am sure its there, can anyone tell me where? i would greatly appreciate
it. and also, if you cast Alliance on a guard...like a darkelf guard, will
he attack you?


-Aeramus [ELITE]

Bristlebane
